title: 3 and Out - Phil /NFL Parallels; CFB Transfer Rule Game Changer; Julio Drama
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Phil /NFL Parallels; CFB Transfer Rule Game Changer; Julio Drama
description:
In this episode, John reacts to Phil Mickelson's unexpected PGA Championship win at 50, and how his health evolution is similar to the evolution of the NFL culture. He also looks at how the new one-time college football transfer rule is a game-changer, and discusses the biggest headlines from Monday, including Julio Jones declaring he's leaving the Falcons on Undisputed. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
